member.name: T:ElevatorControl.Controllers.ElevatorController
member.summary: API Endpoints to manipulate the Elevator

member.name: M:ElevatorControl.Controllers.ElevatorController.RequestFloor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Requests the elevator move to the specified floor
member.param: Floor number the elevator should arrive at

member.name: M:ElevatorControl.Controllers.ElevatorController.GetFloors
member.summary: Retrieves the current floors the elevator has been requested to service
member.returns: A list of current floors the elevator has been requested to service

member.name: M:ElevatorControl.Controllers.ElevatorController.NextFloor
member.summary: Obtains and removes the next floor from the elevators work queue
member.remarks: Removes this floor from the existing work queue
member.returns: The next floor in the work queue
member.response: No more work in the elevators queue

member.name: M:ElevatorControl.State.GetWorkQueue
member.summary: Retrieves the queue of floors the elevator is servicing
member.returns: List of floors the elevator is servicing

member.name: M:ElevatorControl.State.AddFloor(ElevatorControl.Floor)
member.summary: Adds a floor for the elevator to move to

member.name: M:ElevatorControl.State.NextFloor
member.summary: Retrieves the next floor for the elevator to move to
member.remarks: Removes the next floor from the work queue
member.returns: The next floor in the queue
